thing-type.label: ZEN16 Multirelay
thing-type.description: Multirelay<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<strong&gtFeatures</strong&gt</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtPowerful dry contact relays to control loads up to 15 A and 20 A</li&gt <li&gtPerfect for outdoor lighting, pool pumps, garage door, or gas fireplace</li&gt <li&gtControl up to 3 connected loads independently or together</li&gt <li&gtZ-Wave or optional wall switch control (toggle or momentary type)</li&gt <li&gtBuilt-in timers for each relay to simplify automation</li&gt <li&gtRemembers and restores on/off status after power failure</li&gt <li&gtBuilt-in Z-Wave Plus signal repeater to extend network range</li&gt <li&gtPowered by 12-24 V DC/AC or USB C port for easy set-up</li&gt <li&gtWall mounting and minimal design for clean installation</li&gt <li&gtS2 security protocol and the latest 500 Z-Wave chip</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gt<strong&gtSpecifications</strong&gt</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtModel Number: ZEN16</li&gt <li&gtZ-Wave Signal Frequency: 908.42 MHz</li&gt <li&gtPower: 12-24 V DC/AC or USB C</li&gt <li&gtMaximum Load: Relay 1: 15A (HP), R2: 15A (HP), R3: 20A (HP)</li&gt <li&gtRange: Up to 100 feet line of sight</li&gt <li&gtOperating Temperature: 32-104° F (0-40° C)</li&gt <li&gtInstallation and Use: Indoor only</li&gt </ul&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtStart Z-Wave inclusion.</li&gt <li&gtQuickly press the Z-Wave button 3 times.</li&gt </ol&gt<p&gtThe LED indicator will blink to signal communication and remain on for 2 seconds to confirm inclusion.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtBring the Multirelay close to the Z-Wave controller and then supply power to it.</li&gt <li&gtPut the Z-Wave binding into exclusion mode.</li&gt <li&gtQuickly press the Z-Wave button 3 times.</li&gt </ol&gt
